price: ߕߎ߬ߡߊ߬ߘߏ߫ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌߣߵߊ߬ ߣߊ߬ߕߊ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߥߟߊߞߏ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߕߘߍ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߖߘߍ߬ߞߟߏ߬ߦߊ߬ߓߊ߯ ߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: rubamā yawaddu alladhīna kafarū law kānū mus'limīna
